resources.string:
Healthy diet for children 0 - 24 months: 
● It is important to breastfeed also after 6 months 
● It is important to start feeding the baby solid food like beans, vegetables and eggs after 6 months only. 
● It is important to feed the baby a variety of solid foods from 3 food groups 
 
● The 3 food groups are: 
Energy food (rice, wheat, potatoes ) 
Growth development foods (meat, fish, chickpeas and other pulses, yogurt, milk and egg 
Protective foods: Vegetables (green etc), fruits. 
● while feeding a child one should be patient and playful taking plenty of time
\n● While you are pregnant: It is important to eat food like beans, vegetables and dairy products when you are pregnant. \n● It is important to eat a balanced diet from all 4 food groups
\n● Baby: 0-6 months. Baby needs only breast feeding in this period. No additional food is needed. \n● Mothers should eat a balanced diet with plenty of pulses, vegetables and dairy products.

● Baby 6 - 9 months: Start giving the baby solid food after 6 months 
● The baby still needs breastfeeding 
● Use food from the 3 different food groups. It should be smooth and thick, without lumps” 
● Feed baby solid foods 3 times a day

● Baby 9 - 12 months: The baby needs solid food and breastfeeding 
● Feed baby 3 times a day, plus 1 snack 
● Use a variety of food from the 3 food groups

● Baby 12- 24 months: The baby needs solid food and breastfeeding 
● Feed baby solid food 3 times a day, plus 2 snacks 
● Use a variety of food from the 3 food groups 
●Twice a year, provide vitamin A supplement

How to prepare nutritional flour: \nTake 2 proportions of different types of grains (corn, barley, rye, millet, oat, rice, etc. one proportio each) and 1 proportion of cereals/lentils (soya, chickpeas, peas, etc). Separately sort/clean and dry roast well until cooked properly and then separately grind store. This flour can be cooked with green spinach, carrot ,milk, clarified butter, honey , eggs, meat, and iodized salt.

Ingredients: 
● Rice 25 gram 
● Mung / pink lentil / split yellow pigeon peas / black gram lentil 8 gram 
● Clarified butter or oil 5 gram 
● Green spinach (saag) according to taste 
 
Direction: 
● Clean rice and lentils. 
● Mix rice and lentil together and soak for half an hour after washing. 
● After half an hour, cook in a pan covering with lid using a bit of clarified butter and water. 
● While porridge is being cooked, add finely chopped green spinach and cook further covering with lid. 
● Add iodized salt for taste.

● Visit the healthpost 4 times during pregnancy 
● Make sure to eat a balanced diet 
● Balanced diet means eating food from all 4 food groups. 
● get plenty of rest. 
● wash hands after toilet and before eating.

● Visit the health post after 24 hours of birth, after 3 days, after 7 days and after 4 months. 
● Only breastfeeding is needed. No additional food or water. 
● If milk is not enough let the baby suckle more often. This will increase milk production 
● Wash hands before feeding baby

● Visit the healthpost at 6 months and 9 months. 
● Start to feed the baby solid food. 
● Start with a few spoonfuls 3 times in a day. 
● Use jaulo or litto 
● Slowly increase upto three bowls per day. 
● Give one bowl of jaulo and 2 glass of litto in a day 
● Wash your hands with soap before feeding your baby

● Visit the healthpost when the baby is 9 months old. 
● Give 3 meals in a day + 1 snack 
● Breastfeed frequently 
● Make litto and jaulo. 
● Give fruit as a snack. 
● Never give junkfood. 
● Use clean and safe water. 
● Wash hands before feeding

● Grains: Maize, wheat, rice 
● Pulses: Lentils, beans. 
● Vegetable and fruit 
● Dairy products
An unhealthy snack is not a body hack
Banana - The fuel of the brain
